China property developers Sunac, CIFI say projects get local govt supportChinese property developers Sunac China and CIFI Holdings said some of their projects had been listed by local governments as suitable for loans, adding to the number of defaulted developers getting support from authorities. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 03:37:36 GMT OKQSICXUCNLAVMF3TTMSGFQBHI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-property-developers-sunac-cifi-say-projects-get-local-govt-support-2024-02-05/Reuters世界中国
Factbox: What's in the $118 billion Senate security billA group of U.S. Senators said Sunday they had reached a bipartisan $118 billion security agreement to put new restrictions on the U.S. border and provide military aid to Israel and Ukraine. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 03:10:16 GMT D2Y4VT3E3BJWRGC4CQCLIN7RK4 https://www.reuters.com/world/us/factbox-whats-118-billion-senate-security-bill-2024-02-05/Reuters世界美国
Australian writer Yang Hengjun given suspended death sentence in BeijingA Beijing court on Monday handed Australian writer Yang Hengjun a suspended death sentence, five years after he was first detained in China and three years after a closed-door trial on espionage charges. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 02:45:54 GMT HMTNVGUQQBO4DHC5X2SVEIGOYY https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/australian-yang-hengjun-handed-suspended-death-sentence-by-beijing-court-2024-02-05/Kirsty Needham, Laurie Chen世界亚太地区
Insight: China bets on open-source chips as US export controls mountWhen a Beijing-based military institute in September published a patent for a new high-performance chip, it offered a glimpse of China's bid to remake the half-trillion dollar global chip market and withstand U.S. sanctions. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 02:11:30 GMT DNGTDML65RIA3BKNXB54QNIOT4 https://www.reuters.com/technology/china-bets-open-source-chips-us-export-controls-mount-2024-02-05/Eduardo Baptista技术
Investors dig into India's stock market as China flounders, discount risksIndia's $4 trillion stock market is pulling in billions of dollars of domestic and foreign money as investors flock to a fast-growing alternative to China, brushing aside risks around overpriced shares, upcoming elections and regulatory uncertainty. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 02:07:45 GMT WVQAH7OV65NUNHPAC6TEKATCGY https://www.reuters.com/markets/asia/investors-dig-into-indias-stock-market-china-flounders-discount-risks-2024-02-05/Jaspreet Kalra, Jayshree Pyasi市场宏观问题
Asian stocks slump as traders dial back rate cut betsAsian shares fell on Monday and the dollar climbed after a robust U.S. jobs report dashed any expectations of a near-term interest rate cut from the Federal Reserve, while stocks in China stocks remained on the back foot on weak sentiment. Mon, 05 Feb 2024 02:05:36 GMT MHMKNFHE7FO5JOSVLTSHE25ZBU https://www.reuters.com/markets/global-markets-wrapup-1-2024-02-05/Ankur Banerjee市场
